title: Saturday parade
brief_description: A candid camera study with mood music of the Cape Town Parade on a typical Saturday. The second hand stalls and flower market; street sweepers; the carillon; street artists and photographers; children; the “table-cloth” coming down on Table Mountains; a hamburger stand and a horse cab a night.
